Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Full Height Roller Shutter Level Loading Doors

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Waleswood Industrial Estate is a well established estate comprising 22 industrial/warehouse units, totalling 112,000 sq ft (10,405 sq m) over three blocks of terraced accommodation. The estate provides modern refurbished industrial / warehouse units ranging from 5,548 to 6,097 sq ft. The scheme is at the entrance of the new Gulliver’s Valley Theme Park Resort which is now open. The estate has attracted a range of both local and national occupiers including Yorkshire Crisps, Panel Systems Limited, Pollybrook, Xpress Sameday Limited and Parker Lane Limited. Clutch manufacturers
LUK are located on the adjacent site.

The land is located within the Liberty Steel operational site which is accessed immediately off Sheffield Road (A6178). J34 of the M1 motorway is 0.8 miles to the west and Rotherham Town Centre is 1.8 miles to the north east. The surrounding area is an established commercial / industrial location with neighbouring occupiers such as ELG Haniel, Cooper and Turner, Magna Science Centre, MTL and Parcel Force.

The warehouse bay is located within the Liberty Steel operational site which is accessed immediately off Sheffield Road (A6178). J34 of the M1 motorway is 0.8 miles to the west and Rotherham Town Centre is 1.8 miles to the north east. The surrounding area is an established commercial / industrial location with the neighbouring occupiers such as ELG Haniel, Cooper and Turner, Magna Science Centre, MTL and Parcel Force.

The engineering workshop is located within the Liberty Steel operational site which is accessed immediately off Sheffield Road (A6178). J34 of the M1
motorway is 0.8 miles to the west and Rotherham Town Centre is 1.8 miles to the north east. The surrounding area is an established commercial / industrial location with the neighbouring occupiers such as ELG Haniel, Cooper and Turner, Magna Science Centre, MTL and Parcel Force.

The property comprises a modern detached warehouse / industrial unit of steel frame construction incorporating two storey ancillary offices and separate office / works toilet and kitchenette facilities. The property is situated on Kea Park Close which forms part of the well-established Hellaby Industrial Estate, Rotherham. Motorway access is provided via Junction 1 of the M18 approximately 600m to the west, which in turn connects to the M1 at J32 (within 1 mile). Rotherham town centre is approximately 5 miles to the west and Sheffield City Centre is approximately 9 miles to the south west.
